accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on access to this collection.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of posters which describe various events that have taken place at Harvard Divinity School, mostly during the 1990s. Some events that are covered include Black History Month, some Dudleian lectures, and a poster celebrating fifty years of women at Harvard Divinity School. The collection also includes various miscellaneous documents such as a copy of Life magazine, 1955; an engraving of Thomas Hollis; HDS architectural drawings, and an Earth Day poster from 1970.
